feature.name: Port Scanning Detection and Logging
feature.summary: The Port Scanning Detection and Logging feature adds port filtering rules to the firewall of
feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012661 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012661 MO instance.
